summary.span: 代表 Windows NT 效能計數器元件。

span.span: Represents a Windows NT performance counter component.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 元件可用來讀取現有的預先定義或自訂的計數器和發佈 （寫入） 效能資料至自訂計數器。The component can be used for both reading existing predefined or custom counters and publishing (writing) performance data to custom counters. 有許多預先定義的計數器，Windows 效能監視器中所列[新增計數器對話方塊](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=257854)。There are numerous predefined counters listed in the Windows Performance Monitor's [Add Counters dialog box](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkId=257854). 若要深入了解.NET Framework 效能計數器，請參閱[效能計數器](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/performance-counters.md)。To learn about the .NET Framework performance counters, see [Performance Counters](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/performance-counters.md). 此類型會實作介面。This type implements the interface. 當您完成使用類型時，您應該會處置它直接或間接。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接處置的類型，呼叫其方法中的`try` / `catch`區塊。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要為其配置間接，使用語言建構例如`using`（C# 中） 或`Using`（在 Visual Basic)。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 「 使用物件的實作 IDisposable 」 一節介面 > 主題。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. > [!IMPORTANT] > 在版本的.NET Framework 1.0 和 1.1 中，這個類別會要求為完全信任立即呼叫端。In versions 1.0 and 1.1 of the .NET Framework, this class requires immediate callers to be fully trusted. 從.NET Framework 2.0 版開始，這個類別會要求特定動作。Starting with the .NET Framework version 2.0, this class requires for specific actions. 強烈建議，不授與完全信任程式碼。It is strongly recommended that not be granted to semi-trusted code. 讀取和寫入的效能計數器的功能可讓程式碼來執行動作，例如列舉執行中處理序和取得其相關資訊。The ability to read and write performance counters allows code to perform actions such as enumerating executing processes and obtaining information about them. > > 此外，傳遞較不受信任的程式碼的物件可以建立安全性問題。In addition, passing a object to less-trusted code can create a security issue. 絕對不要將傳遞的效能計數器物件，例如或至較不受信任的程式碼。Never pass performance counter objects, such as a or , to less trusted code. 若要讀取從效能計數器，建立的執行個體類別中，設定， ，以及 （選擇性）或屬性，然後再呼叫方法以讓效能計數器讀取。To read from a performance counter, create an instance of the class, set the , , and, optionally, the or properties, and then call the method to take a performance counter reading. 若要發行的效能計數器資料，建立使用的一或多個自訂的計數器方法，建立的執行個體類別中，設定， ，並選擇性地或屬性，然後呼叫， ，或方法或一組屬性來變更您的自訂計數器的值。To publish performance counter data, create one or more custom counters using the method, create an instance of the class, set the , and, optionally, or properties, and then call the , , or methods, or set the property to change the value of your custom counter. > [!NOTE] > ， ，和方法會使用聯鎖更新計數器的值。The , , and methods use interlocks to update the counter value. 這有助於在多執行緒或多重處理序的情況下，但結果也會在對效能帶來負面影響，保留的計數器值正確無誤。This helps keep the counter value accurate in multithreaded or multiprocess scenarios, but also results in a performance penalty. 如果您不需要的精確度，連鎖作業提供，您可以更新屬性直接只列出前 5 倍的效能改善。If you do not need the accuracy that interlocked operations provide, you can update the property directly for up to a 5 times performance improvement. 不過，在多執行緒案例中，部分更新的計數器值可能會忽略，導致不正確的資料。However, in multithreaded scenarios, some updates to the counter value might be ignored, resulting in inaccurate data. 此計數器是根據效能收集資料的機制。The counter is the mechanism by which performance data is collected. 登錄儲存之所有計數器，其中每個相關的系統功能的特定區域的名稱。The registry stores the names of all the counters, each of which is related to a specific area of system functionality. 範例包括處理器的忙碌時間、 記憶體使用量或透過網路連接已接收的位元組數目。Examples include a processor's busy time, memory usage, or the number of bytes received over a network connection. 每個計數器均為唯一識別透過其名稱和位置。Each counter is uniquely identified through its name and its location. 在檔案路徑包括磁碟機、 目錄、 一個或多個子目錄和檔案名稱的相同方式，計數器資訊包含四個項目： 電腦、 類別、 分類執行個體和計數器名稱。In the same way that a file path includes a drive, a directory, one or more subdirectories, and a file name, counter information consists of four elements: the computer, the category, the category instance, and the counter name. 類別目錄或效能物件計數器會測量資料，必須包含的計數器資訊。The counter information must include the category, or performance object, that the counter measures data for. 電腦的類別包括實體元件，例如處理器、 磁碟和記憶體。A computer's categories include physical components, such as processors, disks, and memory. 也有系統的類別，例如處理序和執行緒。There are also system categories, such as processes and threads. 每個類別目錄與相關功能的項目，請在電腦內，且已指派給它的一組標準的計數器。Each category is related to a functional element within the computer and has a set of standard counters assigned to it. 這些物件會列在 [新增計數器] 對話方塊中，在 Windows 2000 系統監視器效能物件下拉式清單，您必須將它們包含在計數器路徑。These objects are listed in the Performance object drop-down list of the Add Counters dialog box within the Windows 2000 System Monitor, and you must include them in the counter path. 效能資料分組依據的分類是相關。Performance data is grouped by the category to which is it related. 在某些情況下，可以存在幾份相同的類別目錄。In certain cases, several copies of the same category can exist. 例如，數個處理序和執行緒同時執行，而某些電腦包含多個處理器。For example, several processes and threads run simultaneously, and some computers contain more than one processor. 分類的複本稱為類別的執行個體，和每個執行個體具有一組標準指派給它的計數器。The category copies are called category instances, and each instance has a set of standard counters assigned to it. 如果類別可以有多個執行個體，則執行個體規格必須包含在計數器資訊。If a category can have more than one instance, an instance specification must be included in the counter information. 若要取得執行必要的計算所需的初始或上一個值的計數器的效能資料，請呼叫方法兩次，並使用您的應用程式需要所傳回的資訊。To obtain performance data for counters that required an initial or previous value for performing the necessary calculation, call the method twice and use the information returned as your application requires. > [!NOTE] > 與安裝的效能計數器分類[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]使用不同的共用的記憶體，且每個效能計數器分類都有它自己的記憶體。Performance counter categories installed with the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)] use separate shared memory, with each performance counter category having its own memory. 您可以指定不同的共用記憶體的大小，藉由建立 DWORD 登錄機碼 HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services 中名為 FileMappingSize\\*\<類別名稱 >*\效能。You can specify the size of separate shared memory by creating a DWORD named FileMappingSize in the registry key HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SYSTEM\CurrentControlSet\Services\\*\*\Performance. FileMappingSize 值設定為類別目錄的共用的記憶體的大小。The FileMappingSize value is set to the shared memory size of the category. 預設大小為 131072 十進位。The default size is 131072 decimal. 如果 FileMappingSize 值不存在，`fileMappingSize`屬性值`performanceCounters`使用 Machine.config 檔案中指定的項目時，導致組態檔處理的額外負擔。If the FileMappingSize value is not present, the `fileMappingSize` attribute value for the `performanceCounters` element specified in the Machine.config file is used, causing additional overhead for configuration file processing. 您可以藉由設定登錄中的檔案對應大小，達成應用程式啟動時的效能改善。You can realize a performance improvement for application startup by setting the file mapping size in the registry. 如需檔案對應大小的詳細資訊，請參閱[ <performanceCounters>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/performancecounters-element.md)。For more information about the file mapping size, see [<performanceCounters>](~/docs/framework/configure-apps/file-schema/trace-debug/performancecounters-element.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別來建立和使用計數器型別。The following code example demonstrates the use of the class to create and use an counter type. 範例會建立分類、 計數器設定、 收集資料，從計數器，然後呼叫解譯的效能計數器資料的類別。The example creates categories, sets up counters, collects data from the counters, and calls the class to interpret the performance counter data. 中繼和最終結果會顯示在主控台視窗中。The intermediate and final results are displayed in the console window. 如需其他效能計數器類型的其他範例，請參閱列舉型別。For additional examples of other performance counter types, see the enumeration. [!code-cpp[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/CPP/averagecount32.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/CS/averagecount32.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/VB/averagecount32.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式設定的多載， ，和屬性為空字串 ("")，並設定到本機電腦上，屬性 ("。")。This overload of the constructor sets the , , and properties to empty strings (""), and sets the property to the local computer, ("."). 這個建構函式不會初始化效能計數器，因此不會與本機電腦上的現有計數器關聯執行個體。This constructor does not initialize the performance counter, so it does not associate the instance with an existing counter on the local computer. 若要指向特定的效能計數器，設定， ，並選擇性地和讀取的任何其他屬性，或嘗試從計數器讀取之前的內容。To point to a specific performance counter, set the , , and, optionally, the and properties before reading any other properties or attempting to read from a counter. 若要寫入的效能計數器，請設定屬性`false`。To write to a performance counter, set the property to `false`. > [!NOTE] > 套用至這個成員的屬性具有下列屬性值： | 。The attribute applied to this member has the following property value: | . 不會影響桌面應用程式 (這些應用程式的啟動方式一般都是按兩下圖示、輸入命令或在瀏覽器輸入 URL)。The does not affect desktop applications (which are typically started by double-clicking an icon, typing a command, or entering a URL in a browser). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱類別或[SQL Server 程式設計和主機保護屬性](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md)。For more information, see the class or [SQL Server Programming and Host Protection Attributes](~/docs/framework/performance/sql-server-programming-and-host-protection-attributes.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立預設執行個體類別。The following code example creates a default instance of the class. 建立執行個體之後， ， ，和屬性值已設定，而且呼叫的結果方法會顯示。After the instance is created, the , , and property values are set, and the results of a call to the method are displayed. [!code-cpp[PerfCounter#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerfCounter/CPP/perfcounter.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PerfCounter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerfCounter/CS/perfcounter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PerfCounter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerfCounter/VB/perfcounter.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 參數字串不區分大小寫。The parameter strings are not case-sensitive. 您可以使用這個多載來存取屬於含有單一效能計數器分類執行個體在本機電腦上的計數器。Use this overload to access a counter on the local computer that belongs to a category containing a single performance counter category instance. 如果您嘗試使用這個建構函式指向這包含多個執行個體，建構函式擲回例外狀況類別的執行個體。If you attempt to use this constructor to point this instance to a category that contains multiple instances, the constructor throws an exception. 這個多載可以存取任何唯讀或讀取/寫入計數器，但不會以唯讀模式。This overload can access any read-only or read/write counter, but does so in a read-only mode. A建立使用這個多載的執行個體無法寫入計數器，即使計數器本身是可讀寫。A instance created using this overload cannot write to the counter, even if the counter itself is read/write. 這個建構函式設定的多載和屬性的值您傳入，、 設定到本機電腦上，屬性"。"，並設定屬性設為空字串 ("")。This overload of the constructor sets the and properties to the values you pass in, sets the property to the local computer, ".", and sets the property to an empty string (""). 這個建構函式會初始化效能計數器，並將執行個體與本機電腦上的現有計數器 （系統或自訂的計數器） 產生關聯。This constructor initializes the performance counter and associates the instance with an existing counter (either a system or a custom counter) on the local computer. 您為傳入的值和屬性必須指向本機電腦上現有的效能計數器。The values that you pass in for the and properties must point to an existing performance counter on the local computer. > [!NOTE] > 若要閱讀 Windows Vista、 Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中的效能計數器，您必須是 Performance Monitor Users 群組的成員，或具有系統管理權限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免您的權限來存取效能計數器，Windows Vista 中的提高權限，請將自己加入到 Performance Monitor Users 群組。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 中，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是內建 Administrators 群組的成員，系統會將兩個執行階段存取語彙基元 (Token) 指派給您：標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要執行的程式碼會存取效能計數器，您必須先將您的權限從標準使用者提高為系統管理員。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 您可以在啟動應用程式時，以滑鼠右鍵按一下應用程式圖示，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行，藉此提高為系統管理員權限。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 參數字串不區分大小寫。The parameter strings are not case-sensitive. 使用此多載來存取的唯讀或讀取/寫入本機電腦屬於含有單一效能計數器類別執行個體上的計數器。Use this overload to access a read-only or read/write counter on the local computer that belongs to a category containing a single performance counter category instance. 如果您嘗試使用這個建構函式指向這包含多個執行個體，建構函式擲回例外狀況類別的執行個體。If you attempt to use this constructor to point this instance to a category that contains multiple instances, the constructor throws an exception. 這個建構函式設定的多載， ，和屬性的值您傳入，、 設定到本機電腦上，屬性"。"，並設定屬性設為空字串 ("")。This overload of the constructor sets the , , and properties to the values you pass in, sets the property to the local computer, ".", and sets the property to an empty string (""). 這個建構函式會初始化效能計數器，並將執行個體與本機電腦上的現有計數器 （系統或自訂的計數器） 產生關聯。This constructor initializes the performance counter and associates the instance with an existing counter (either a system or a custom counter) on the local computer. 您為傳入的值和屬性必須指向本機電腦上現有的效能計數器。The values that you pass in for the and properties must point to an existing performance counter on the local computer. 如果您指向的效能計數器執行個體不是有效的呼叫建構函式會擲回例外狀況。If the performance counter instance that you point to is not valid, calling the constructor throws an exception. > [!NOTE] > 您可以使用這個多載來連接至系統計數器，但您無法寫入至系統計數器。You can use this overload to connect to a system counter, but you cannot write to a system counter. 因此，設定`readOnly`至`false`當連接到系統計數器造成擲回例外狀況的建構函式。Therefore, setting `readOnly` to `false` when connecting to a system counter causes the constructor to throw an exception. > [!NOTE] > 若要閱讀 Windows Vista、 Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中的效能計數器，您必須是 Performance Monitor Users 群組的成員，或具有系統管理權限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免您的權限來存取效能計數器，Windows Vista 中的提高權限，請將自己加入到 Performance Monitor Users 群組。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 中，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是內建 Administrators 群組的成員，系統會將兩個執行階段存取語彙基元 (Token) 指派給您：標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要執行的程式碼會存取效能計數器，您必須先將您的權限從標準使用者提高為系統管理員。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 您可以在啟動應用程式時，以滑鼠右鍵按一下應用程式圖示，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行，藉此提高為系統管理員權限。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例建立的執行個體類別。The following code example creates an instance of the class. 此範例會傳入類別名稱、 計數器名稱和旗標值，指出此計數器不唯讀的。The example passes in category names, counter names, and a flag value indicating that the counter is not read-only. 這個程式碼範例是一個較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example for the class. that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 您可以在啟動應用程式時，以滑鼠右鍵按一下應用程式圖示，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行，藉此提高為系統管理員權限。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. > [!NOTE] > 在 Windows Vista 中，當遠端電腦所屬工作群組中，您可能需要停用 UAC，讓本機使用者帳戶未篩選，而且可以是提升為系統管理員帳戶。In Windows Vista, when the remote computer is a member of a workgroup, you may need to disable UAC so that the local user account is not filtered and can be elevated to an administrator account. 基於安全性理由，停用 UAC 應該是最後的手段。For security reasons, disabling UAC should be a last resort. 如需停用 UAC 資訊，請參閱[使用者帳戶控制和 WMI](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=91617)。For information on disabling UAC, see [User Account Control and WMI](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=91617).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 會顯示在`Performance Object`欄位的效能計數器管理員 MMC 嵌入式管理單元中`Add Counter` 對話方塊。The is displayed in the `Performance Object` field of Performance Counter Manager MMC snap in's `Add Counter` dialog box. 效能計數器監視類別目錄或在電腦上的效能物件的行為。A performance counter monitors the behavior of a category, or performance object, on a computer. 類別包含實體元件 （例如處理器、 磁碟和記憶體） 和系統物件 （例如處理程序和執行緒）。Categories include physical components (such as processors, disks, and memory) and system objects (such as processes and threads). 相同的效能物件與相關的系統計數器已分組到類別目錄中，指出其常見的焦點。System counters that are related to the same performance object are grouped into a category that indicates their common focus. 當您建立的執行個體類別，您先指示與其互動的元件，，然後從該類別選取計數器的類別目錄。When you create an instance of the class, you first indicate the category with which the component will interact, and then you choose a counter from that category. 例如，一個 Windows 計數器分類是記憶體類別目錄。For example, one Windows counter category is the Memory category. 此類別內的系統計數器會追蹤記憶體資料，例如可用的位元組數目和快取的位元組數目。System counters within this category track memory data such as the number of bytes available and the number of bytes cached. 如果您想要使用快取應用程式中的位元組，您會建立的執行個體元件，請將它連接到 「 記憶體 」 類別目錄，然後挑選 （在此情況下，快取位元組） 類別的適當的計數器。If you wanted to work with the bytes cached in your application, you would create an instance of the component, connect it to the Memory category, and then pick the appropriate counter (in this case, Cached Bytes) from that category. 雖然您的系統提供許多更多計數器類別，您可能將互動最常使用的類別目錄會是快取、 記憶體、 物件、 PhysicalDisk、 程序、 處理器、 伺服器、 系統與執行緒分類。Although your system makes many more counter categories available, the categories that you will probably interact with most frequently are the Cache, Memory, Objects, PhysicalDisk, Process, Processor, Server, System, and Thread categories. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立預設執行個體類別。The following code example creates a default instance of the class. 建立執行個體之後， ， ，和屬性值已設定，而且呼叫的結果方法會顯示。After the instance is created, the , , and property values are set, and the results of a call to the method are displayed. counters in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免您的權限來存取效能計數器，Windows Vista 中的提高權限，請將自己加入到 Performance Monitor Users 群組。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 中，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是內建 Administrators 群組的成員，系統會將兩個執行階段存取語彙基元 (Token) 指派給您：標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要執行的程式碼會存取效能計數器，您必須先將您的權限從標準使用者提高為系統管理員。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 您可以在啟動應用程式時，以滑鼠右鍵按一下應用程式圖示，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行，藉此提高為系統管理員權限。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 列舉包含的效能計數器，以互動的型別。The enumeration contains the types of performance counters that you can interact with. 部分計數器型別代表導出的值，例如，系統採用計數器測量的平均值。Some of the counter types represent calculated values, such as the average of the counter measurements the system has taken. 其他類型代表原始資料、 或未計算的值。Other types represent raw, or uncalculated, values. 下表顯示您互動最頻繁的計數器型別。The following table shows the counter types that you will interact with most frequently. |計數器的責任Counter's Responsibility|PerformanceCounterType 值PerformanceCounterType Value|範例Example| |------------------------------|----------------------------------|-------------| |維護項目或作業的簡單計數。Maintain a simple count of items or operations.|`NumberOfItems32`|追蹤以 32 位元整數的形式接收的訂單數目。Tracking the number of orders received as a 32-bit integer.| |維護高容量的簡單計數。Maintain a higher-capacity simple count.|`NumberOfItems64`|追蹤的極大量的站台的訂單數目，儲存為 64 位元整數。Tracking the number of orders for a site with very high volume, stored as a 64-bit integer.| |追蹤項目或作業每秒的數。Track the number of items or operations per second.|`RateOfCountsPerSecond32`|追蹤站台上每秒接收的訂單。Tracking orders received per second on a site.| |追蹤項目或作業每秒的高容量數的字。Track a higher-capacity number of items or operations per second.|`RateOfCountsPerSecond64`|追蹤訂單每秒接收非常大量的站台上。Tracking orders received per second on a site with very high volume.| |計算的平均時間，來執行處理程序，或處理項目Calculate the average time to perform a process or to process an item|`AverageTimer32`|計算訂單處理所花費的平均時間。Calculate the average time an order takes to be processed.| remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以撰寫至自訂計數器。You can write only to custom counters. 系統的所有計數器都是唯讀。All system counters are read-only. > [!NOTE] > ， ，和方法會使用聯鎖更新計數器的值。The , , and methods use interlocks to update the counter value. 這有助於在多執行緒或多重處理序的情況下，但結果也會在對效能帶來負面影響，保留的計數器值正確無誤。This helps keep the counter value accurate in multithreaded or multiprocess scenarios, but also results in a performance penalty. 如果您不需要的精確度，連鎖作業提供，您可以更新屬性直接只列出前 5 倍的效能改善。If you do not need the accuracy that interlocked operations provide, you can update the property directly for up to a 5 times performance improvement. 不過，在多執行緒案例中，部分更新的計數器值可能會忽略，導致不正確的資料。However, in multithreaded scenarios, some updates to the counter value might be ignored, resulting in inaccurate data. > [!NOTE] > 如果值屬性是和效能計數器分類以.NET Framework 1.0 或 1.1 版建立就會擲回。If the value for the property is and the performance counter category was created with .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, an is thrown. 與舊版本建立的效能計數器分類使用全域共用的記憶體和值必須。Performance counter categories created with earlier versions use global shared memory, and the value for must be . 如果類別不會使用在 1.0 或 1.1 版.NET Framework 版本上執行的應用程式中，刪除並重新建立類別。If the category is not used by applications running on versions 1.0 or 1.1 of the .NET Framework, delete and recreate the category.

summary.span: 取得或設定這個效能計數器的執行個體名稱。

span.span: Gets or sets an instance name for this performance counter.

value.span: 效能計數器分類執行個體的名稱，如果計數器是單一執行個體計數器，則為空字串 ("")。

span.span: The name of the performance counter category instance, or an empty string (""), if the counter is a single-instance counter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 執行個體名稱必須少於 128 個字元的長度。Instance names must be shorter than 128 characters in length. 在某些情況下，類別會細分為執行個體，且追蹤的物件與相關的分類的多個項目相關資料。In some situations, categories are subdivided into instances, which track data about multiple occurrences of the object that a category relates to. 執行個體套用至整個分類，而非個別計數器。Instances apply to the category as whole, rather than to individual counters. 在類別內的每個計數器已針對分類定義每個執行個體。Every counter within a category has each instance defined for the category. 例如，處理序類別包含名為閒置和系統的執行個體。For example, the Process category contains instances named Idle and System. 處理序類別內的每個計數器，因此包含每個執行個體，顯示有關閒置處理程序或系統處理序的相關資訊的資料。Every counter within the Process category thus contains data for each instance, showing information about either idle processes or system processes. 許多類別並不會包含多個執行個體，因此您可以將此屬性空白，表示沒有任何執行個體都與分類。Many categories do not contain multiple instances, so you can leave this property empty to indicate that no instance is associated with the category. 如果這個執行個體指向非自訂的類別目錄中，您可以選擇只有現有的類別執行個體。If this instance points to a noncustom category, you can choose from only the existing category instances. 您可以只在自訂類別，可讓您定義多個計數器和類別執行個體，視需要建立新的類別執行個體。You can create new category instances only in custom categories, which allow you to define as many counters and category instances as you need. 若要建立效能分類執行個體，指定`instanceName`上建構函式。To create a performance category instance, specify an `instanceName` on the constructor. 如果所指定的類別執行個體`instanceName`已經存在新的物件會參考現有的類別執行個體。If the category instance specified by `instanceName` already exists the new object will reference the existing category instance. > [!NOTE] > 請勿使用字元"（"，"）"，"#"、"\\"，或"/"中的執行個體名稱。Do not use the characters "(", ")", "#", "\\", or "/" in the instance name. 如果任何這些字元使用效能主控台 (請參閱[執行階段分析](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/runtime-profiling.md)) 可能無法正確顯示執行個體值。If any of these characters are used, the Performance Console (see [Runtime Profiling](~/docs/framework/debug-trace-profile/runtime-profiling.md)) may not correctly display the instance values. 如果執行個體名稱會自動產生，且可能包含字元"（"，"）"，"#"、"\\"，或 「 / 」，請使用下表中的字元對應。If the instance name is automatically generated and might contain the characters "(", ")", "#", "\\", or "/", use the character mapping in the following table. |字元Character|對應的字元Mapped character| |---------------|----------------------| |((|[[| |))|]]| |#|__| |\|_\|_| |/|__| 屬性取自物件屬性是一個常見的來源的執行個體名稱可以包含無效的字元。The property of the object obtained from the property is a common source of instance names that can contain invalid characters. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立預設執行個體類別。The following code example creates a default instance of the class. 建立執行個體之後， ， ，和屬性值已設定，而且呼叫的結果方法會顯示。After the instance is created, the , , and property values are set, and the results of a call to the method are displayed. [!code-cpp[PerfCounter#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerfCounter/CPP/perfcounter.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PerfCounter#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerfCounter/CS/perfcounter.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PerfCounter#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerfCounter/VB/perfcounter.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以寫入的值只計數器，可位於本機電腦上。You can write values only to counters that reside on the local computer. 不過，您可以讀取計數器的值，您可以從任何電腦的企業中擁有存取權限。However, you can read counter values from any computer in the enterprise for which you have access privileges. 當您將屬性以指向遠端電腦，執行個體會嘗試開啟該電腦上的計數器。When you set the property to point to a remote computer, the instance attempts to open the counter on that computer. 如果計數器不存在，設定這個屬性會擲回例外狀況。If the counter does not exist, setting this property throws an exception.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法通常用於含有未計算的值的計數器。This method is generally used for counters that contain uncalculated values. > [!NOTE] > 如果值屬性是和效能計數器分類以.NET Framework 1.0 或 1.1 版建立就會擲回。If the value for the property is and the performance counter category was created with .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, an is thrown. 與舊版本建立的效能計數器分類使用全域共用的記憶體和值必須。Performance counter categories created with earlier versions use global shared memory, and the value for must be . 如果類別不會使用在 1.0 或 1.1 版.NET Framework 版本上執行的應用程式中，刪除並重新建立類別。If the category is not used by applications running on versions 1.0 or 1.1 of the .NET Framework, delete and recreate the category. > [!NOTE] > 若要閱讀 Windows Vista、 Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中的效能計數器，您必須是 Performance Monitor Users 群組的成員，或具有系統管理權限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免您的權限來存取效能計數器，Windows Vista 中的提高權限，請將自己加入到 Performance Monitor Users 群組。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 中，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是內建 Administrators 群組的成員，系統會將兩個執行階段存取語彙基元 (Token) 指派給您：標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要執行的程式碼會存取效能計數器，您必須先將您的權限從標準使用者提高為系統管理員。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 您可以在啟動應用程式時，以滑鼠右鍵按一下應用程式圖示，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行，藉此提高為系統管理員權限。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法，以取得計數器的下一個未計算的值。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to obtain the next uncalculated value of a counter. 這個程式碼範例是一個較大範例的一部分類別。This code example is part of a larger example for the class. [!code-cpp[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/CPP/averagecount32.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/CS/averagecount32.cs#3)] [!code-vb[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/VB/averagecount32.vb#3)]

summary.span: 取得計數器樣本，並為其傳回計算過的值。

span.span: Obtains a counter sample and returns the calculated value for it.

returns.span: 系統為這個計數器取得的下一個計算過的值。

span.span: The next calculated value that the system obtains for this counter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 如果兩個計數器讀取相依計數器的計算的值，第一次讀取的作業傳回 0.0。If the calculated value of a counter depends on two counter reads, the first read operation returns 0.0. 重設指定不同的計數器的效能計數器屬性就相當於建立新的效能計數器，並使用新的屬性，第一次讀取的作業會傳回 0.0。Resetting the performance counter properties to specify a different counter is equivalent to creating a new performance counter, and the first read operation using the new properties returns 0.0. 建議的延遲時間呼叫之間方法是一秒，以便執行下一個累加讀取計數器。The recommended delay time between calls to the method is one second, to allow the counter to perform the next incremental read. > [!NOTE] > 若要讀取效能計數器，您必須具有系統管理權限。To read performance counters, you must have administrative privileges. 在 Windows Vista 中，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是內建 Administrators 群組的成員，系統會將兩個執行階段存取語彙基元 (Token) 指派給您：標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要執行的程式碼會存取效能計數器，您必須先將您的權限從標準使用者提高為系統管理員。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 您可以在啟動應用程式時，以滑鼠右鍵按一下應用程式圖示，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行，藉此提高為系統管理員權限。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立計數器，並使用方法來顯示時間週期內的計數器的值。The following code example creates an counter and uses the method to display the counter's values over a time period. [!code-cpp[PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime/CPP/elapsedtime.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime/CS/elapsedtime.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.ElapsedTime/VB/elapsedtime.vb#2)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property long RawValue { long get(); void set(long value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定這個計數器的未經處理或未經計算的值。

span.span: Gets or sets the raw, or uncalculated, value of this counter.
The raw value of the counter.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果計數器型別是 32 位元大小，而且您嘗試將此屬性設為太大，超出的值，屬性就會截斷為 32 位元值。If the counter type is a 32-bit size and you attempt to set this property to a value that is too large to fit, the property truncates the value to 32 bits. 當讀取自訂的計數器，在本機電腦上，使用屬性，而不是計算的值可能會產生原始值足夠的案例中大幅提升效能。When reading custom counters on the local computer, using the property rather than a calculated value can produce significantly better performance in scenarios where the raw value is sufficient. 如果您正在閱讀的計數器是唯讀，則取得屬性的屬性稱為次範例計數器。If the counter that you are reading is read-only, getting the property samples the counter at the time that the property is called. 這個動作等同於初始呼叫方法。This action is equivalent to making an initial call to the method. 如果您後續呼叫，您可以在兩個呼叫都會傳回的值上執行計算。If you subsequently call , you can perform calculations on the values that both calls returned. 由於系統計數器是唯讀的您可以取得，但未設定其原始值。Because system counters are read-only, you can get but not set their raw values. > [!NOTE] > ， ，和方法會使用聯鎖更新計數器的值。The , , and methods use interlocks to update the counter value. 這有助於在多執行緒或多重處理序的情況下，但結果也會在對效能帶來負面影響，保留的計數器值正確無誤。This helps keep the counter value accurate in multithreaded or multiprocess scenarios, but also results in a performance penalty. 如果您不需要的精確度，連鎖作業提供，您可以更新屬性直接只列出前 5 倍的效能改善。If you do not need the accuracy that interlocked operations provide, you can update the property directly for up to a 5 times performance improvement. 不過，在多執行緒案例中，部分更新的計數器值可能會忽略，導致不正確的資料。However, in multithreaded scenarios, some updates to the counter value might be ignored, resulting in inaccurate data. > [!NOTE] > 如果值屬性是和效能計數器分類以.NET Framework 1.0 或 1.1 版建立就會擲回。If the value for the property is and the performance counter category was created with .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, an is thrown. 與舊版本建立的效能計數器分類使用全域共用的記憶體和值必須。Performance counter categories created with earlier versions use global shared memory, and the value for must be . 如果類別不會使用在 1.0 或 1.1 版.NET Framework 版本上執行的應用程式中，刪除並重新建立類別。If the category is not used by applications running on versions 1.0 or 1.1 of the .NET Framework, delete and recreate the category. > [!NOTE] > 若要閱讀 Windows Vista、 Windows XP Professional x64 Edition 或 Windows Server 2003 中的效能計數器，您必須是 Performance Monitor Users 群組的成員，或具有系統管理權限。To read performance counters in Windows Vista, Windows XP Professional x64 Edition, or Windows Server 2003, you must either be a member of the Performance Monitor Users group or have administrative privileges. > > 若要避免您的權限來存取效能計數器，Windows Vista 中的提高權限，請將自己加入到 Performance Monitor Users 群組。To avoid having to elevate your privileges to access performance counters in Windows Vista, add yourself to the Performance Monitor Users group. > > 在 Windows Vista 中，使用者帳戶控制 (UAC) 會判斷使用者的權限。In Windows Vista, User Account Control (UAC) determines the privileges of a user. 如果您是內建 Administrators 群組的成員，系統會將兩個執行階段存取語彙基元 (Token) 指派給您：標準使用者存取語彙基元及管理員存取語彙基元。If you are a member of the Built-in Administrators group, you are assigned two run-time access tokens: a standard user access token and an administrator access token. 根據預設，您會屬於標準使用者角色。By default, you are in the standard user role. 若要執行的程式碼會存取效能計數器，您必須先將您的權限從標準使用者提高為系統管理員。To execute the code that accesses performance counters, you must first elevate your privileges from standard user to administrator. 您可以在啟動應用程式時，以滑鼠右鍵按一下應用程式圖示，並指出您想要以系統管理員身分執行，藉此提高為系統管理員權限。You can do this when you start an application by right-clicking the application icon and indicating that you want to run as an administrator. ## Examples 下列範例會使用類別來顯示的值計數器的屬性。The following example uses the class to display the value of the property for a counter. [!code-cpp[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/CPP/averagecount32.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/CS/averagecount32.cs#1)] [!code-vb[PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/PerformanceCounterType.AverageCounter64/VB/averagecount32.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 系統計數器，應一律`true`。For a system counter, should always `true`. 您無法寫入至系統計數器。You cannot write to a system counter.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void RemoveInstance() cil managed

summary.span: 刪除由 物件 屬性所指定的分類執行個體。

span.span: Deletes the category instance specified by the object property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以移除僅適用於自訂的計數器執行個體。You can remove an instance only for a custom counter. 所有系統計數器都是唯讀的因此嘗試移除其中一個方法擲回例外狀況。All system counters are read-only, so attempting to remove one of them throws an exception. > [!NOTE] > 若要發行的效能計數器共用記憶體時，請避免可能的競爭情形，建議方法呼叫從事件處理常式。To avoid a possible race condition when the performance counter shared memory is released, it is recommended that the method be called from the event handler. 若要建立效能分類執行個體，指定`instanceName`上建構函式。To create a performance category instance, specify an `instanceName` on the constructor. 如果所指定的類別執行個體`instanceName`已經存在新的物件會參考現有的類別執行個體。If the category instance specified by `instanceName` already exists the new object will reference the existing category instance. > [!NOTE] > 如果值屬性是和效能計數器分類以.NET Framework 1.0 或 1.1 版建立就會擲回。If the value for the property is and the performance counter category was created with .NET Framework version 1.0 or 1.1, an is thrown. 與舊版本建立的效能計數器分類使用全域共用的記憶體和值必須。Performance counter categories created with earlier versions use global shared memory, and the value for must be . 如果類別不會使用在 1.0 或 1.1 版.NET Framework 版本上執行的應用程式中，刪除並重新建立類別。If the category is not used by applications running on versions 1.0 or 1.1 of the .NET Framework, delete and recreate the category.
